name: Tab Age Tracker
description: A Chrome extension to track and analyze the age of your open tabs to help you reach tab zero.
changelog: Added local search functionality in the popup
Removed Options, Check Old Tabs, and Web Dashboard buttons
Kept only 'View Details' button styled green and centered
Modified the openDetailView function to use openWebDashboard
Updated search to no longer auto-redirect to dashboard
Fixed search results display in the Chrome extension popup
author: ReachTabZero Team
